title: as a yas main
body:
he is fine and balanced where he is at right now

yasuo is supposed to be a high skill cap champion and now in order to preform properly since the patch you know have to know how to use him.
Before this patch he was freelo and what is going on is people who play him for freelo not wanting to actually learn he champ is hurting yasuos win rate since they don't know how to play him properly and just expect free wins

take time to learn him properly now and you will start winning with him again
(I am a smurf)

yasuo does not need a rework
